summary: This document is an electronic communication from the FBI Miami requesting information regarding two specific inmates, Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Lester Kessler, as part of an ongoing investigation. The request includes details about their custody status, facilities, and any relevant dates.

persons.name: Steven Hoffenberg
persons.context: Hoffenberg is mentioned as a current or former inmate whose information is being requested by the FBI.

persons.name: Berry Lester Kessler
persons.context: Kessler is mentioned as a current or former inmate believed to be deceased, whose information is also being requested by the FBI.

persons.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
persons.context: Rodriguez is the agent who drafted the communication requesting information regarding the inmates.

keyFacts: The document is a request for information regarding two inmates, Steven Hoffenberg and Berry Lester Kessler.
The request is part of an ongoing investigation by the FBI Miami.
The document mentions specific details that the FBI is seeking, including custody dates and facilities.
Berry Lester Kessler is believed to be deceased.
The communication is drafted by Special Agent Alfredo Rodriguez.
